trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There were no other sightings in Bradenton on or around August 12th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile enjoying my daily bike ride I noticed what I first believed to be an airplane trail at an extremely high altitude. It was so high I thought to myself that it could not be a plane that had taken-off from Tampa International Airport. The trail began to fade when another, shorter trail appeared. The object appeared to glow or flash very brightly and then was no longer visible.
Summary: Appeared egg shape but difficult to tell because of distance
